name: Feather of Praying
summary: Everyone has their own story and also has a different fate from others. No matter how cruel the reality is, we all have the right to hope for the future, look forward to, and look forward to, wishing that tomorrow will be better. Perhaps one day in the future, a chance will allow us to realize the desire that has always been buried in our hearts. But what did we get at that time ... or what we once expected?
